'''''SEVEN 38''''' is the thirty-eighth volume of the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]'s annual journal ''[[SEVEN]]'', published in [[2022]]. Note that the issue's year is "2021/2022," for an issue was not published in [[2021]].<ref name="vii" />
